snippet: There will be a new slogan, "Pop of culture," new programming like "Opening Act," a talent show from Nigel Lythgoe, and a modular Web site with display ads interspersed among the articles.
abstract: There will be a new slogan, "Pop of culture," new programming like "Opening Act," a talent show from Nigel Lythgoe, and a modular Web site with display ads interspersed among the articles.

headline.main: As E! Channel Rebrands Itself, It Introduces a More Ad-Friendly Web Site
